backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles, product catalog defaults, and order storage with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new order-details and routing work to affected files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup table containing short descriptions of major frontend files for build and documentation purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining warm OKLCH color variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup, navigation menu, layout, and routes including order tracking and admin pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches the backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching products, orders, admin status, and for updating product prices and creating orders using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRatesPage.tsx: Admin UI for logging in, viewing products, editing their prices individually or in bulk, and refreshing data.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, recalculates prices using latest product data, and allows item quantity management and removal.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays checkout form, validates user input, recalculates cart prices, and submits orders through the createOrder mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows business contact details, hours, and a brief description of the dairy brand.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, features, and navigation to products and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays confirmation details for a specific order, including customer info and ordered items.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Provides an order lookup form and shows detailed order information after validating and fetching by ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays dairy and frozen dessert products with add‑to‑cart support and loading/error states.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Implements cart state management with add, update, remove, total, count, syncing, and session storage persistence.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines the CartItemType interface specifying product name, price, and quantity.
frontend/src/utils/cartPricing.ts: Calculates cart totals using latest product prices and flags missing products in pricing results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, feature list, and known issues for the DAIRY FIELD online store build.
